attributes.action: Create a new day of the week called Newday
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This day will fall between Sunday and Monday therefore lengthening the weekend and still having the 5 day working week.

"Less weeks in the year, but christmas would come round a lot quicker."

* More to follow..

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
